title: Writing GED Extended Response Test 1
intro_text:
Extended Response

Welcome to the Extended Response Initial Practice Test!

This is a quick test to see how prepared you are for the extended response portion of the GED® Reasoning Through Language Arts test. We'll use your results to help create your learning plan and make recommendations as you move through the course.

Take your time with this test and do your best to respond to the prompt. We will grade your response and give you feedback as quickly as possible, usually by the next day.

There is one extended response on the test. This test will give you practice with the type of writing extended response you will see on the GED® test and help us generate a study plan for what you need to brush up on for the test.

Relax and do your best!
